## Config.Default.TerritoryPriorityQualifiers variable

Qualifier definitions in which territory is the primary qualifier, with language as a secondary qualifier.

**Signature:**

```typescript
TerritoryPriorityQualifiers: ReadonlyArray<Qualifiers.IQualifierDecl>
```

## Remarks

The default qualifiers are: - currentTerritory(token: geo): territory qualifier, priority 850 - language(token: lang): language qualifier, priority 800
